name: podley
description: Podley is a tool for building and running DAG pipelines of AI tasks.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/*tsbuildinfo packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts packages/*/src/**/*\.map examples/*/node_modules examples/*/dist examples/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts examples/*/src/**/*\.map .turbo */*/.turbo
scripts.watch:packages: concurrently --kill-others -c 'auto' -n sqlite,util,storage,job-queue,task-graph,tasks,ai,provider,test 'cd packages/sqlite && bun run watch' 'cd packages/util && bun run watch' 'cd packages/storage && bun run watch' 'cd packages/job-queue && bun run watch' 'cd packages/task-graph && bun run watch' 'cd packages/tasks && bun run watch' 'cd packages/ai && bun run watch' 'cd packages/ai-provider && bun run watch' 'cd packages/test && bun run watch'
